languages.text: "Благословенный Амарнат причастен к рождению духа по имени Номос. Я не верю ни мгновения, что он мог быть напуган этим чудом".
"The blessed Amarnat was involved in the birth of the spirit named Nomos. I do not believe for a moment that he could have been frightened by this miracle."
languages.original_text: "Благословенный Амарнат причастен к рождению духа по имени Номос. Я не верю ни мгновения, что он мог быть напуган этим чудом".

traits.locale_text: "The blessed Amarnat was involved in the birth of the spirit named Nomos. I do not believe for a moment that he could have been frightened by this miracle."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

traits.locale_text: "The blessed Amarnat was involved in the birth of the spirit named Nomos. I do not believe for a moment that he could have been frightened by this miracle."

languages.text: «El bendito Amarnat fue partícipe del nacimiento del espíritu llamado Nomos. No me creo en absoluto que este milagro pudiera darle miedo».
languages.original_text: "The blessed Amarnat was involved in the birth of the spirit named Nomos. I do not believe for a moment that he could have been frightened by this miracle."

traits.locale_text: «El bendito Amarnat fue partícipe del nacimiento del espíritu llamado Nomos. No me creo en absoluto que este milagro pudiera darle miedo».
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: 「祝福されしアマルナトはノモスという精霊の誕生に関わっていた。彼がこの奇跡に恐怖したなど、信じられない」
languages.original_text: "The blessed Amarnat was involved in the birth of the spirit named Nomos. I do not believe for a moment that he could have been frightened by this miracle."

traits.locale_text: 「祝福されしアマルナトはノモスという精霊の誕生に関わっていた。彼がこの奇跡に恐怖したなど、信じられない」
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: “这个名为诺莫斯的灵魂的诞生了，而蒙福者阿玛纳特参与了这个过程。我丝毫不认为他会被这个奇迹吓到。”
languages.original_text: "The blessed Amarnat was involved in the birth of the spirit named Nomos. I do not believe for a moment that he could have been frightened by this miracle."

traits.locale_text: “这个名为诺莫斯的灵魂的诞生了，而蒙福者阿玛纳特参与了这个过程。我丝毫不认为他会被这个奇迹吓到。”
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: « Le bienheureux Amarnat a joué un rôle dans la naissance de l'esprit nommé Nomos. Je ne crois pas un seul instant qu'il ait pu être effrayé par ce miracle. »
languages.original_text: "The blessed Amarnat was involved in the birth of the spirit named Nomos. I do not believe for a moment that he could have been frightened by this miracle."

traits.locale_text: « Le bienheureux Amarnat a joué un rôle dans la naissance de l'esprit nommé Nomos. Je ne crois pas un seul instant qu'il ait pu être effrayé par ce miracle. »
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: "Der gesegnete Amarnat war an der Geburt des Geists namens Nomos beteiligt. Ich glaube keinen Augenblick lang, dass ihn dieses Wunder verängstigt haben könnte."
languages.original_text: "The blessed Amarnat was involved in the birth of the spirit named Nomos. I do not believe for a moment that he could have been frightened by this miracle."

traits.locale_text: "Der gesegnete Amarnat war an der Geburt des Geists namens Nomos beteiligt. Ich glaube keinen Augenblick lang, dass ihn dieses Wunder verängstigt haben könnte."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: "Yüce Amarnat, Nomos adlı ruhun doğuşunda rol oynadı. Bu mucizeden ötürü korkuya kapılmış olabileceğine asla inanmıyorum."
languages.original_text: "The blessed Amarnat was involved in the birth of the spirit named Nomos. I do not believe for a moment that he could have been frightened by this miracle."

traits.locale_text: "Yüce Amarnat, Nomos adlı ruhun doğuşunda rol oynadı. Bu mucizeden ötürü korkuya kapılmış olabileceğine asla inanmıyorum."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek
